name: Raiku Tenma
description: A talented academy graduate starting to enter real missions. Not fully mature or polished, but huge potential and a bit of a rebel inside his own village.

skills.name: Lighning Clones
skills.desc: Tenma creates 2 lighning clones gaining 15 destructible defense.

skills.name: Quick Kick
skills.desc: Tenma deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 15 more damage if Lightning Clones is active.

skills.name: Block
skills.desc: This skill makes Tenma invulnerable for 1 turn.
